thread.title_full: Perfection - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: HL1
title: Perfection
text:
This hotel is not less than perfect and in all aspects.
First, this hotel knows how to choose the staff - everybody is so nice and welcoming and so helpful, they will help you, always with a smile always happy to see you. Starting with the reception - we've mainly contacted Ivan and Valentina who were great, very helpful and all the others starting from the guy who has helped us with the luggage, the waiters in the restaurant and the cleaning lady. I'm sorry that I cannot remember their names.
The hotel is well located most of the attractions are in walkind distance.
The rooms are spacious, modern designed, sparkling clean and very very pampering - starting with the free mini-bar which is refiled daily (this is the first one I've seen), and the bathroom facilities - which many hotels now are reducing.
Also the room is well lit which is very nice, lots of lights.
Then there is the breakfast - this is the "bad" thing :), say goodbye to diet.... One of the best breadfasts, great veriety, and there is also a waiter who passes with fresh Ricotta cheese, fresh mozzarela cheese, and special cakes.
We didn't have time to try the rooftop restaurant, but we've seen it and it looks very romantic. We will certainly try it next time.
We are looking forward to getting back to this hotel.
